title: Female Sports Stars
description: Female Sports Stars is a biographical text that focuses on the inspiration and motivation of four young ladies: Mia Hamm, Venus and Serena Williams, and Bethany Hamilton. Each story provides students with positive messages that inspire them to succeed. Photographs support the text.
highFrequencyWords: bone marrow, commemorate, dedicate, dominated, doubles, legacy, scholarships, singles, spectators, strenuous, tourniquet, transplant
reviewWords: Use of vocabulary lessons requires a subscription to VocabularyA-Z.com.
comprehension: Complex Sentences                : Identify and use complex sentences
awareness: Synonyms and Antonyms                : Understand the use of synonyms and antonyms
phonics:
Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
